column5: Should come as standard equipment on all fishing gear sold.
Mine says "if I can smack you with my rod you're too close"!!!!
Hard to read underwater Albert.  Merry Christmas to you and the family.
Mine says " If your treble catches my treble, you're too close"
Guys greasing you out on the 'Geen probably can't read English anyhow, total waste of $$$, lol!!
I can get it translated in 19 languages, if I ever do the eating sport fish guide again
I'd want mine in a much larger font.
I need to get that stitched in to the back of my float suite!
Mine would say  Yes I was cathcing trout but now that your standing on the opposite bank staring down in the pool I might as well go for Tim Horton's
I'd probably have a couple more explicit explitives that we're not allowed to post.   Or get out the special rod with the 20# test and airplane jig.
